items.title: America’s Biggest Bitcoin Miners Are Pivoting to AI
items.description: In the face of a profitability crisis, industrial-scale bitcoin miners are transforming their data centers into AI factories.

items.title: Can Bike Riders and Self-Driving Cars Be Friends?
items.description: Some cycling advocates are on board with robotaxis. Others see the self-driving car boom as perpetuating auto dependency.

items.title: 50% Off Chewy Promo Code | December 2025

items.title: FTC upholds ban on stalkerware founder Scott Zuckerman
items.description: Zuckerman, who used to run the stalkerware apps SpyFone and SpyTrac, claimed the ban is hurting his unrelated business.

items.title: Department of Commerce approves Nvidia H200 chip exports to China
items.description: This news comes as a bill was introduced in Congress last week to prevent these exact kinds of chip exports.

items.title: Investor letter reveals skyrocketing growth of Waymo’s robotaxi rides
items.description: Six months ago, Waymo disclosed it was providing 250,000 robotaxi rides. But it's grown significantly since, a leaked letter says.

items.title: SoftBank and Nvidia reportedly in talks to fund Skild AI at $14B, nearly tripling its value
items.description: Skild AI is developing a hardware-agnostic foundation model for robots that can be customized for various uses.
